name: Andrea Corradini 0001
content: Andrea Corradini's Home Page Andrea Corradini Full Professor, Computer Science Department, University of Pisa, Stanza 286 ELargo Bruno Pontecorvo 3 Phone:  +39 050 2212786,Fax: +39 050 2212726Email:andrea.corradini@unipi.it Current Scientific Interests: Algebraic and Categorical Semantics of Programming Languages, Concurrency, Graph Grammars, Nested Conditions, Term Graph Rewriting, Term Rewriting, Petri nets. Publications: see DBLP. Coordinator for Internationalization of the Computer Science Department of Pisa Short CV: PDF Didattica / Teaching A.A. 2024-25 Advanced Programming Course of the Master Programme in Computer Science and Networking [AP-2019, cod.301AA, ECTS credits: 9] The teaching material will be published on the Advanced Programming web page. Fondamenti dell'Informatica, Corso A Corso di Laurea in Informatica [FDI, 9 CFU] Il materiale didattico verrà pubblicato sulla piattaforma Moodle Andrea Corradini (andrea.corradini@unipi.it)
